nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: Welcome to the Rusty Anchor! What can I get ya?

nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: Information, eh? Well, I hear things. What do you want to know?

choices.text: Have you seen anything unusual lately?

nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: Safe travels then, stranger. The roads can be dangerous at night.

nodes.speaker: Bartender
nodes.text: Unusual? Hmm... There's an old chest in the corner. Been there for years. Rumor says there's something inside.

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Welcome to my humble shop! Browse as you like.

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: A bit of everything! Tools, supplies, and the occasional curiosity.
